A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolute garbage\, don't waste your money watching this in the theater. Obviously they just wanted to destroy the old Star Wars to make way for their new vision. If I could have sat through a Jar-Jar stand alone film if it meant that this never would have happened then I gladly would have sacrificed my sanity. As a true Star Wars fan I send my deepest apologies out to Luke\, Leia and Han\, for us this is not how it ended.....
